name: Band Hunter
description:
Finally! The band scouting simulator of your dreams is here!

"BAND HUNTER" is a game about listening to tunes and deciding the fates of bands in an alternative 1994!

Will you give tomorrow's next superstar their first break?
Or will you shatter the dreams of ever hopeful new band?
Only you can decide!
***
BAND HUNTER was made in 72 hours forSA Game Jam 2022 by;

Ben "Candy Claws" Lazerbeam - Art, Words, Code and Tunes
Kirstyn "Panda Paws" Lazerbeam - Code

***
"This game was jammed out to explore the idea of a "band scouting simulator" mini game for our pro-wrestler dating sim Wrestling With Emotions: New Kid On The Block.
***
Did you enjoy Band Hunter? Wanna listen to more imaginary bands? Let us know! Leave us a comment or come hang out on our Discord!

Thanks for playing!
